Note "by the Secretary.The accompanying Memoranda, viz(a) Memorandum by the General Staff(G.I.D. Paper No. 709-B)(b) Summaries by tho Secretary, Committeeof Imperial Defence.(C. I.D. Papers IIos. 535-B and 708-B)which have been prepared In accordance with the Gonclusionsof the 215th Meeting of the Committee of Imperial Defence,are circulated to the Cabinet by direction of the PrimeMinister, for consideration before the recess.The Minutes of the Meeting of tho Committee of ImperialDefence referred to above will be circulated later (C0P.294(26))(Sgd. ) M.P.A. HAM KEY,Secretary, Cabinet-i NOTE: The enclosures referred to above are not attached in the case of Ministers who have already received them as Members of the Committee of Imperial Defence."ji2, Whitehall Gardens, S.Y/.1 28th July, 1926.
